titleStmt.title: Kyrou paideia, or, The institution and life of Cyrus the Great written by that famous philosopher and general, Xenophon of Athens, and from the original Greek made English, the first four books by Francis Digby ..., the four last by John Norris.
titleStmt.author: Xenophon.
Digby, Francis.
Norris, John, 1657-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Matthew Gilliflower ... and James Norris ...,

notesStmt.note: First two words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
